des: "This pudding is inspired by my favorite Mexican chocolate cake recipe. Cinnamon and cayenne pepper spice up this avocado-based dessert. It is sweetened with cream of coconut, which gives it a totally unique, exotic flavor. Enjoy!"
ins: Blend avocados, cream of coconut, cocoa powder, cinnamon, and cayenne pepper together in a blender until smooth. Transfer pudding to a bowl and refrigerate, at least 2 hours.
